content:
ToolStripItemAlignment Enum

Definition

Determines the alignment of a ToolStripItem in a ToolStrip.

In this Article

public enum ToolStripItemAlignment
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ToolStripItemAlignment

Fields

Left

Specifies that the ToolStripItem is to be anchored toward the left or top end of the ToolStrip, depending on the ToolStrip orientation. If the value of RightToLeft is Yes, items marked as Left are aligned to the right side of the ToolStrip.
Right

Specifies that the ToolStripItem is to be anchored toward the right or bottom end of the ToolStrip, depending on the ToolStrip orientation. If the value of RightToLeft is Yes, items marked as Right are aligned to the left side of the ToolStrip.
